description: Conical horn frustum validated against Webster horn equation analytical solution
physics: Webster equation for conical horn: p(x) = (x_t/x) * [A*exp(-jkx) + B*exp(jkx)]

expected.behavior: SPL generally increases with frequency in passband
expected.notes: Webster is 1D plane-wave approximation; FEM is full 3D. Agreement is qualitative.

source: Analytical solution of Webster horn equation for conical frustum geometry
